PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08472020-10-30TC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts I, V and VI — ELT)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, V AND VI – ELT) in order to (1) require Canadian aircraft, with exceptions, be equipped with Emergency Locator Transmitters (ELT) capable of broadcasting simultaneously on frequencies of 406 MHz and 121.5 MHz; (2) require foreign aircrafts operating in Canada to be equipped with a serviceable emergency beacon that transmits on a 406 MHz frequency that is approved by COSPAS-SARSAT and is registered with the appropriate authority; and (3) designate new administrative monetary penalties.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0238 Publication Date: 2020-11-25
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts I, V and VI — ELT)
